SKT_FIRST.name: Wailing Rhapsody
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000007_1_1]</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000007_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Valiant Concerto
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000007_2_1]</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000007_2_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Night at the Opera
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases the chance to inflict Stunned by 15%

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Increases the chance to inflict Stunned by 15%

description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000007_3_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000007_3_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to reduce Defense of the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to reduce <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> of the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000007_chain_1_1]</color> chance to reduce Defense of the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000007_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000007_backup_1_1]</color> chance to reduce <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> of the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000007_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.
